name: Phoenix Framework
short_description:
A multi-module framework to facilitate developing java enterprise solutions
The frame work consists of the following modules:
  1) Modules Hub: bridge connecting modules
  2) Core:
   a. Provides metadata of each entity in the module
   b. Manages beans (fields validations, listeners ...)
   c. Handles calculated fields. The calculated fields are referred by a formula, and this formula is evaluated and set to the field
  3) Persistence: data access layer (Java Persistence API)
  4) Workflow Management
  5) Expression Language
  6) Messages: This module is responsible to provide messages (error messages, labels, and some values) in the user context language
  7) Presentation: Dynamic view generation for entities
  8) Notification/mail: (SMS, FAX, email)
  9) Job Scheduler
 10) Security
summary: Multi-module framework to facilitate developing enterprise solutions
